Author: yuvadeep
Title: [ANN] TERNIO BLOCKCHAIN FOR DIGITAL ADVERTISING
Body: The Digital advertising industry is used to deliver their advertisements to the consumers, but at present days they are facing many problems like fraud domain, helps in visiting thousands of people daily, not having the clear picture, transactions, it is difficult for advertisers and publishers shows the path. Ternion self-says that "A series of Three" 3 vies of the digital advertising ecosystem is a place where users, publishers, advertiser are included. Ternio is a blockchain based utility token where can connect with publishers, work with advertisers, and verify the users. Tornio helps in preventing the fraud and help advertisers to display their ads to the users. Ternio helps in preventing the fraud and help advertisers to display their ads to the users, speed, organize, clarity, payments, charge the amount, it is possible for all the advertisers to connect with the publishers without allowing any third party. Blockchain helps to solve the problems for all the digital advertising industry. To solve all the problems Ternio uses a series of tools and blockchain helps to achieve extremely high transaction rates that desire to schedule the digital advertising.

Author: wyvern2
Title: [ANN] TERNIO BLOCKCHAIN FOR DIGITAL ADVERTISING
Body: so what is the real benefit for publisher/webmaster?

Author: Ternio
Title: [ANN] TERNIO BLOCKCHAIN FOR DIGITAL ADVERTISING
Body: Good question!   First let's address the problem.  50% of ever ad dollar goes to the supply chain.  That means that if BMW spends $1.00 to advertise on WSJ, then WSJ only collects $0.50.  That is absurd.  In addition, WSJ has to wait 30-120 days (1-4 months) to be paid for showing that impression.  Last, WSJ has no idea how many companies transact to deliver that ad.  Many times it's 20-30 companies that sit in between BMW and WSJ (that's where 50% of the spend goes.)  Ternio brings transparency to this process, enabling WSJ to understand how many intermediaries sit between their site and BMW.  With this knowledge, WSJ can compress the supply chain to recapture the majority of the $1.00 BMW spends.   In addition, Ternio enables WSJ to be paid in real time.  No more waiting months to collect.    1) Collect a much higher percentage of ad dollars 2) Collect at the time of impression delivery - enabling better cash flow to run their business.

Author: RickyCardero
Title: [ANN] TERNIO BLOCKCHAIN FOR DIGITAL ADVERTISING
Body: now the biggest advertising service going from google. because a lot of people use internet. so how you wanna compete with this titan?

Author: Ternio
Title: [ANN] TERNIO BLOCKCHAIN FOR DIGITAL ADVERTISING
Body: This should provide more detail for you on how it works: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byzantine_fault_tolerance  Quote from: RickyCardero on April 13, 2018, 04:26:48 PM now the biggest advertising service going from google. because a lot of people use internet. so how you wanna compete with this titan?  Not compete, but complement.  Google has many advertising products.  Some are software tools like DFP (doubleclick for publishers) and DBM (double click bid manager).  Others are closed ecosystem ad networks like adwords/adsense.  With adsense, google is selling the media (advertisements).  Ternio doesn't sell any media.  That's why so many companies are fine utilizing our tech - it doesn't threaten their business   Ternio's technology can be used with all of Google's software and (if Google choses) can be integrated with their ad network as well.
